title: List of science fiction films of the 1960s
html:
List of science fiction films of the 1960s

Jump to navigation Jump to search

A list of science fiction films released in the 1960s. These films include core elements of science fiction, but can cross into other genres. They have been released to a cinema audience by the commercial film industry and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable critics. Collectively, the science fiction films from the 1960s received five Academy Awards, a Hugo Award and a BAFTA Award.

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also
  • 3 Notes
  • 4 References

See also[edit]

  • History of science fiction films

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ Won an Academy Award for Visual Effects.
  2. ^ Winner of a BAFTA Award for Best British Screenplay.
  3. ^ Alternate title: The Atomic Brain
  4. ^ Won the Golden Bear award at the 1965 Berlin Film Festival.
  5. ^ Alternate title Space Probe Taurus
  6. ^ Won Academy Awards for Art Direction and Visual Effects.
  7. ^ Won an Academy Award for Visual Effects and a Hugo Award for Best Dramatic Presentation.
  8. ^ Winner of an Academy Award for Best Actor.
  9. ^ Alternate title: Journey to the Far Side of the Sun.

paragraphs.text: A list of science fiction films released in the 1960s. These films include core elements of science fiction, but can cross into other genres. They have been released to a cinema audience by the commercial film industry and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable critics. Collectively, the science fiction films from the 1960s received five Academy Awards, a Hugo Award and a BAFTA Award.
